name: Further - Original Bus from Electric Cool-Aid Acid Test photo by KUSHNADAS
description: Further is a 1939 International Harvester school bus purchased by author Ken Kesey in 1964, with the Pranksters took a cross-country road trip to the 1964 World's Fair. Released in  2011 documentary film Magic Trip and the bus was also featured prominently in Tom Wolfe's 1968 book The Electric Kool-Aid Acid Test.  I took this photo while living on the Kesey farm, proceeds will go to restore the bus for future generations.
